main event: A sighting of a flat, oval-shaped UFO with red flashing lights occurred at Stead AFB, Nevada on 14 February 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as flat and oval, resembling the size of a dime at arm's length., It had a blue center and a green ring with a red flashing light that flashed at intervals of 2 to 3 seconds., The object appeared to be two saucers placed face to face., After being stationary for about 5 minutes, the object shot off towards the horizon at an extremely fast speed., The sighting lasted for approximately two hours and involved ground-radar and air-visual observations.
sighted object: flat oval-shaped UFO with a red flashing light
